content: while in the middle of little yellow duck mass production yesterday i couldn t resist temptation and created a half size of other brother darryl 1 the pattern worked out just as imagined and lil other brother was born this one works up in a half hour or less so you can make even more for the little yellow duck project 2 because its smaller it s also a great size for a bag clip or keychain 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/other-brother-darryl---a-duck 2 http //thelittleyellowduckproject org
